path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Spring 25/Clinicals/Assignments/Pediatric Sim Assignments and Info/Asthma Nurse Assignments.pdf
text: Updated 2025 Quinteros Asthma Simulation Nurse Content Review the following prior to your asthma simulation: • Read Chapter 25 pages 607-614 in your Introduction to Maternity and Pediatric Nursing book. • Review and be familiar with the client’s chart in ChartFlow, Asthma check-off sheet, and Asthma ChartFlow charting rubric in D2L. • Complete the table on asthma drugs and submit this assignment via Dropbox on D2L by 7:00 am the morning of your scheduled asthma simulation. • Asthma simulation video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yi5xi9m1xfc The following should be completed after you have completed your asthma simulation: • Asthma Sim ChartFlow charting • Asthma Sim quiz These are both due by 7:00 pm on the day of your scheduled asthma simulation.
